mapper.select: select lms_notice_no lmsNoticeNo, lms_notice_title lmsNoticetitle, lms_notice_content lmsNoticeContent, lms_notice_name lmsNoticeName, lms_notice_createtime lmsNoticeCreatetime, count count from lms_notice
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lms_notice( lms_notice_no, lms_notice_title, lms_notice_content, lms_notice_name, lms_notice_createtime, lms_notice_updatetime, count ) VALUES ( #{lmsNoticeNo}, #{lmsNoticeTitle}, #{lmsNoticeContent}, #{lmsNoticeName}, now(), now(), 0 )
INSERT INTO lms_file( file_name, file_originname, file_type, create_date, lms_notice_no ) VALUES ( #{fileName}, #{fileOriginname}, #{fileType}, now(), #{lmsNoticeNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lms_notice SET lms_notice_title = #{lmsNoticeTitle}, lms_notice_content = #{lmsNoticeContent}, lms_notice_updatetime = now() WHERE lms_notice_no = #{lmsNoticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT n.lms_notice_no lmsNoticeNo, n.lms_notice_title lmsNoticeTitle, n.lms_notice_content lmsNoticeContent, n.lms_notice_name lmsNoticeName, n.lms_notice_createtime lmsNoticeCreatetime, n.lms_notice_updatetime lmsNoticeUpdatetime, n.count count, f.file_originname fileOriginname, f.file_name fileName FROM lms_notice n left outer join lms_file f on n.lms_notice_no = f.lms_notice_no WHERE n.lms_notice_no=#{lmsNoticeNo}
